name: Save Your Cogs
description:
Fun puzzle platformer about robots. Nothing more to say, just download and play.

Game has state "prototype" but all 20 levels completed and verified. Absent small game feature to name game as "completed game". Made for https://itch.io/jam/igmc2018 an https://itch.io/jam/game-off-2018 gamejams.

Have fun!

PS windows builds verified, macos and linux not verified so use it as is.

Controls: 

A - left
D - right
W - jump
SPACE - action
R - restart level

Used software: Defold Engine, Krita, Audacity, http://diforb.com

Used resources: 

background music "Anttis instrumentals - A new language" Public Domain license
